content: संमतिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Agreement. {@--2@} Concurrence, assent, approbation, approval. {@--3@} Wish, desire. {@--4@} Knowledge of self, knowledge of the soul, true knowledge. {@--5@} Regard, respect, esteem; कथमिव तव संमतिर्भवित्रा सममृतुभिर्मुनिनावधीरितस्य <ls>Ki. 10. 36.</ls> {@--6@} Love, affection. {@--7@} Command, order.
